</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Filter-data">Filter data<a class="anchor-link" href="#Filter-data">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>So we've about 4 million records. Let's remove any duplicate application that may be in the record.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">h1bdataDF2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">h1bdataDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop_duplicates</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Case_Number'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">keep</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'last'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"h1bdataDF2 has {0} rows and {1} columns"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">h1bdataDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">h1bdataDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>

h1bdataDF2 has 3788868 rows and 14 columns
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Let's see the available options for <code>Approval_Status</code> field.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">h1bdataDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Approval_Status</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unique</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[5]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>array(['Certified', 'Denied', 'Hold', 'Pending', None, 'DENIED',
       'CERTIFIED', 'WITHDRAWN', 'CERTIFIED-WITHDRAWN',
       'PENDING QUALITY AND COMPLIANCE REVIEW - UNASSIGNED', 'REJECTED',
       'INVALIDATED'], dtype=object)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>For our purpose, it makes sense to keep only applications that were <code>certified</code>. A <code>denied</code> application for example does not give you a lot of confidence about the quality of the application. Before we do that, we need to first remove rows with <code>NA</code>s in the <code>Approval_Status</code> column.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">filteredDF</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">h1bdataDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">subset</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Approval_Status'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"filteredDF: {0}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">filteredDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">certifiedDF</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">filteredDF</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">filteredDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Approval_Status</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">contains</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'certified'</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"certifiedDF: {0}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">certifiedDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>filteredDF: (3788867, 14)
certifiedDF: (3550156, 14)
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Categorize-data-science-related-jobs">Categorize data science related jobs<a class="anchor-link" href="#Categorize-data-science-related-jobs">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Now, we're ready to select applications filed for data science related jobs. I chose the selection criteria based on my view and research of the data science field. But this isn't perfect and feel free to swap in your own criteria :).</p>
<p>First, let's make sure <code>Job_Title</code> column contains only <code>string</code>s.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">rows_with_strings</span>  <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">certifiedDF</span><span class="p">[[</span><span class="s2">"Job_Title"</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span>
       <span class="k">lambda</span> <span class="n">row</span> <span class="p">:</span> 
          <span class="nb">any</span><span class="p">([</span> <span class="nb">isinstance</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">e</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">e</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">row</span> <span class="p">])</span>
       <span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> 
    
<span class="n">df_with_no_strings</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">certifiedDF</span><span class="p">[[</span><span class="s2">"Job_Title"</span><span class="p">]][</span><span class="o">~</span><span class="n">rows_with_strings</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_with_no_strings</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>       Job_Title
435289   66007.9
457835     75483
473113     27.89
494274     71400
546898    541613
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>It seems some job titles were entered as <code>float</code>s. Let's clean out all <code>float</code> job titles.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">certifiedDF2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">certifiedDF</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">rows_with_strings</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">certifiedDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[8]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>(3550104, 14)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Now we can standardize the job titles.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">start_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">titles_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'data analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'data analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'business analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'business analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'informatic'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'informatics'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'operations research'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'operations research'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'data scien'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'data scientist'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'intelligence'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'business intelligence'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
               <span class="s1">'analytics'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'business intelligence'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'data consultan'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'business intelligence'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
               <span class="s1">'data manage'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'business intelligence'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'reporting & analysis'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'business intelligence'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'data min'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'business intelligence'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'reporting and analysis'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'business intelligence'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'database analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'data architect/engineer'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'data architect'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'data architect/engineer'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'data engineer'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'data architect/engineer'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'data warehous'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'data architect/engineer'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'database admin'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'data architect/engineer'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'datawarehous'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'data architect/engineer'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
               <span class="s1">'data model'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'data architect/engineer'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'etl developer'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'data architect/engineer'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
               <span class="s1">'market research analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
               <span class="s1">'customer insight'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'market insight'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'consumer insight'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'marketing insight'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'insights analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'analytic insight'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'strategy and insight'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'mkt. res. analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'marketing & insights'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'global insights'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'insights & analytic'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'strategy and insight'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'marketing & insight'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'insights & analytic'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'health care analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'healthcare analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'quantitative analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'financial analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'marketing analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'management analyst'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
               <span class="s1">'business development'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'consumer insight'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'analytic insight'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'data strateg'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'market analyst'</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s1">'decision scien'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'data scientist'</span><span class="p">}</span>

<span class="n">titles_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">row</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">certifiedDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iterrows</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Job_Title</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="n">currentTitle</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">val</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">val</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">titles_dict</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">items</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">key</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">currentTitle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">titles_list</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">currentTitle</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">titles_list</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"non data science related"</span><span class="p">)</span>
        
<span class="n">certifiedDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Job_Title_revised"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">titles_list</span>

<span class="c1"># Filter out non data science jobs</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">certifiedDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">certifiedDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Job_Title_revised</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="s2">"non data science related"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"dsJobsDF shape: {0}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Time to select data science related jobs and standardize job titles --- </span><span class="si">%s</span><span class="s2"> seconds ---"</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">start_time</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>dsJobsDF shape: (209240, 15)
Time to select data science related jobs and standardize job titles --- 354.9449350833893 seconds ---
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Standardize-salary">Standardize salary<a class="anchor-link" href="#Standardize-salary">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Let's look at <code>Wage_Rate</code> column and see if any standardization is necessary.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [10]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate_Unit</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unique</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>['year' 'hour' 'month' 'week' '2 weeks' 'bi-weekly' 'yr' 'hr' 'wk' 'mth'
 'bi']
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Wage rates range from hourly, weekly, bi-weekly, monthly to yearly. Let's standardize to yearly. But we need to make sure that the wage columns are clean and do not contain special characters.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [11]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unique</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Prevailing_Wage</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unique</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>['$48000.00' '$47359.00' '$48600.00' ..., '147014 -' '47819.00 -' '64501 -']
['$40706.00' '$37149.00' '$37669.00' ..., 117915.0 43.54 147014.0]
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>As you can see, the wage columns contains some special characters such as dollar sign and hyphen. Let's clean those out.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [12]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">start_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF</span>

<span class="c1"># Ensure the columns are of string before applying regex</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Wage_Rate'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Wage_Rate'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Prevailing_Wage'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Prevailing_Wage'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># Remove '$' and '-' signs from Wage_Rate column</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Wage_Rate'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Wage_Rate'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">lambda</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'\$|-.*'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">''</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="c1"># Remove '$' and '-' signs from Prevailing_Wage column</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Prevailing_Wage'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Prevailing_Wage'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">lambda</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'\$|-.*'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">''</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))</span>
        
<span class="c1"># Convert the cleaned wage columns to float</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[[</span><span class="s1">'Wage_Rate'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Prevailing_Wage'</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="p">[[</span><span class="s1">'Wage_Rate'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Prevailing_Wage'</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_numeric</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Time to clean wage columns --- </span><span class="si">%s</span><span class="s2"> seconds ---"</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">start_time</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>(209240, 15)
Time to clean wage columns --- 1.0070388317108154 seconds ---
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Let's see what the wage columns look like now.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Prevailing_Wage</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unique</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>[  4.07060000e+04   3.71490000e+04   3.76690000e+04 ...,   1.17915000e+05
   4.35400000e+01   1.47014000e+05]
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unique</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>[  4.80000000e+04   4.73590000e+04   4.86000000e+04 ...,   4.35400000e+01
   5.05000000e+03   1.47014000e+05]
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>It appears we successfully removed all special characters in the wage columns. Now, finally, we can standardize wage to yearly.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [15]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">start_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">salary_offered</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">salary_prevailing</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">row</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iterrows</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate_Unit</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'y'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">salary_offered</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">salary_prevailing</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Prevailing_Wage</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate_Unit</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'m'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">salary_offered</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">salary_prevailing</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Prevailing_Wage</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate_Unit</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'bi'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'2 weeks'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'bi-weekly'</span><span class="p">]:</span>
        <span class="n">salary_offered</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">26</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># Assumes 52 work wks/yr</span>
        <span class="n">salary_prevailing</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Prevailing_Wage</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">26</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate_Unit</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lower</span><span class="p">()[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'w'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">salary_offered</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">52</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># Assumes 52 work wks/yr</span>
        <span class="n">salary_prevailing</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Prevailing_Wage</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">52</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">salary_offered</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wage_Rate</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">2080</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># This handles the hourly rates. Assumes 52 work wks of 40 hrs/wk</span>
        <span class="n">salary_prevailing</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Prevailing_Wage</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">2080</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF2</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Salary_Offered"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">salary_offered</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Salary_Prevailing"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">salary_prevailing</span>

<span class="c1"># Let's remove any rows without salary Wage information</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">subset</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Salary_Offered'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">subset</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Salary_Prevailing'</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Time to standardize salary --- </span><span class="si">%s</span><span class="s2"> seconds ---"</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">start_time</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'dsJobsDF3: {0}'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># Resets row index so they start from 0</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Time to standardize salary --- 27.00463628768921 seconds ---
dsJobsDF3: (209232, 17)
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Many of the salary information seem question. We've many wages that seem unbelievably high. In data frame below, row 2801 has hourly rate of the <strong>4330560.0</strong>. At the other extreme, we've annual salary of <strong>23.37</strong> for row <strong>24343</strong>. These values are likely entry errors and we should remove them.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [16]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Salary_Offered</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">1000000</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="se">\n\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Salary_Offered</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Let's keep salaries that are greater than 20,000 but less than 1.5 million</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Salary_Offered</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">20000</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Salary_Offered</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">1500000</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Salary_Prevailing</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">20000</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Salary_Prevailing</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">1500000</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">dsJobsDF3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
